scripts.types:local: pnpm --silent supabase gen types --lang=typescript --local --schema public> src/schema/default.ts && pnpm --silent run zod && pnpm --silent fomat:lint
scripts.types:remote: pnpm --silent supabase gen types --lang=typescript --linked --schema public> src/schema/default.ts && pnpm --silent run zod && pnpm --silent fomat:lint
scripts.seed:local: pnpm --silent supabase db dump -f supabase/seed.sql --local --data-only --exclude public.user,auth.users,auth.identities,auth.audit_log_entries,auth.flow_state,auth.sessions,auth.mfa_amr_claims,auth.one_time_tokens,auth.refresh_tokens && pnpm --silent fomat:lint
scripts.seed:remote: pnpm --silent supabase db dump -f supabase/seed.sql --linked --data-only --exclude public.user,auth.users,auth.identities,auth.audit_log_entries,auth.flow_state,auth.sessions,auth.mfa_amr_claims,auth.one_time_tokens,auth.refresh_tokens && pnpm --silent fomat:lint
